about_us.story: Founded in 2004, Elite Upholstery Studio has been the premier destination for furniture restoration and custom upholstery services. Our master craftsmen combine traditional techniques with modern innovations to create stunning furniture pieces that last for generations.
about_us.mission: To preserve the beauty and functionality of furniture while creating custom pieces that reflect our clients' unique style and personality.
